name: @davidsneighbour/textlint-config
description: Textlint configuration used in davidsneighbour's projects.
author: Patrick Kollitsch <patrick@davids-neighbour.com> (https://davids-neighbour.com)

scripts.update: npm-check-updates -u && npm install && git add package* && fixpack && git commit -m "chore(deps): update dependencies"
